::Magmatron::

    "Do not make demands to me." He said. "And the connectio=
n to Galvatron I cannot break, the programming, it will stay for the time b=
eing. It should not prevent you from doing anything you wish. And your goin=
g to have to find your own troops."

  From:=
 rauq@...

2, 2001 5:22 PM

  rem=
oved from me, and I need to have it done NOW" he says 
  pormptly. "As for =
leading the Decepticons, where are the troops 
  going to come from" then h=
e remembered seeing a streak of fire in 
  the sky on his way here. "I also=
 want to investigate something, 
  alone"
